title: Japan Services PMI
description: Services PMI in Japan increased to 53.20 points in October from 52.20 points in September of 2022. Services PMI in Japan averaged 49.83 points from 2013 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 55.30 points in October of 2013 and a record low of 21.50 points in April of 2020. The Japan Services PMI (Purchasing Managers' Index) is based on data collected from a representative panel of over 400 private service sector companies based in Japan. The index tracks variables such as sales, employment, inventories and prices. A reading above 50 indicates that the services sector is generally expanding; below 50 indicates that it is generally declining. This page provides the latest reported value for - Japan Services PMI - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Markit Economics
